width.description: The new width of the screen in pixels, normalized based on the device pixels per inch density (DPI). Example: if a device has a DPI = 2, the width is divided by 2 to get a normalized width.

height.description: The new height of the screen in pixels, normalized based on the device pixels per inch density (DPI). Example: if a device has a DPI = 2, the height is divided by 2 to get a normalized height.
